ISSUE.TITLE: Enable Webhook option in JT and WFJT forms should read "Enable Webhooks"
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ##### ISSUE TYPE - Bug Report ##### SUMMARY See Title ##### STEPS TO REPRODUCE 1. Visit a Job Template or Workflow Job Template page 2. View the add and edit forms for each. ##### EXPECTED RESULTS The option, as well as its corresponding tooltip and aria-label all read "Enable Webhooks", the plural form. ##### ACTUAL RESULTS "Enable Webhook", without the "s".

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #6588 from ryanpetrello/400-error-creds fix a typo in the credentials UI Reviewed-by: https://github.com/apps/softwarefactory-project-zuul

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Update "Enable Webhooks" option in JT and WFJT closes: https://github.com/ansible/awx/issues/6163
Update "Enable Webhooks" option in WFJT closes: https://github.com/ansible/awx/issues/6163
